private_sliders_header_1: The Technology of the Future Meets Today
private_sliders_title_1: Bring the future to the present with our latest tech products! Personal drones, holographic projectors, and AI-supported devices to make your life easier. Special designs await those who want to live the Cyberpunk style.
private_sliders_title_2: Prepare yourself for the future with bionic limbs, magnetic accessories, and personalized modifications. Experience the Cyberpunk style with our functional and stylish designs.
private_sliders_title_3: Take your style to the next level with LED glasses, neon hairbands, magnetic bracelets, and more. Get lost in the magic of neon lights and bring the atmosphere of dystopian cities into your daily life.
private_sliders_header_4: Modification Corner: Do It Yourself, Be Yourself
private_sliders_title_4: In our Modification Corner, personalize or repair your devices. Shape your technology according to your style and reflect the Cyberpunk spirit on your devices. Hold the technology of the future in your hands with our expert team.
private_components_hero_headerDesc: This shop, which I call Ciber Trade, offers an experience that pushes the boundaries of the future and technology. Every corner of the shop is filled with the glow of neon lights and the vibration of holographic screens. On the walls, the silhouettes of giant city views and giant skyscrapers give the feeling that you have stepped into a dystopia. Every shelf, every display case is full of unique pieces that bring the technology of the future to the present
private_page_aboutUs_headerDesc: Provides information about our company's history, mission, vision, values, team, and the sector in general.
private_page_aboutUs_content:
Welcome!

Neon Noir Teknoloji, which combines innovative technologies and Cyberpunk style, was founded in 2023 with the goal of bringing the technology of the future to the present. We have already made a strong mark in the local market and are now moving forward with the vision of becoming a global Cyberpunk technology giant while making our name known worldwide.

Our Mission

To provide innovative, sustainable, and aesthetic technology products to our customers, making Cyberpunk culture a part of daily life. Producing customized solutions for both individual and corporate needs and pushing the boundaries of technology.

Our Vision

To become the leading brand of Cyberpunk technology worldwide. To shape the industry with our innovative products in the global market and make our customers' lives more impactful. To live the technology of the future today.

Our Values
• We offer unique technology solutions with a customer-centric approach in both local and global markets.
• We quickly adapt to technological trends by constantly developing innovative products.
• We produce high-quality and aesthetic products that meet international standards to gain customer trust.
• We focus on unique designs and functionality in every product to preserve and spread Cyberpunk culture.
private_page_faqs_headerDesc: You can review the most frequently asked questions and answers here.
private_page_faqs_question_1: When will my order be shipped?
private_page_faqs_answer_1: Your order is usually shipped within 1-2 business days after payment is confirmed.
private_page_faqs_question_2: When will my order be delivered?
private_page_faqs_answer_2: After being shipped, delivery time usually takes 1-5 business days, depending on your region.
private_page_faqs_question_3: Which courier companies do you work with?
private_page_faqs_answer_3: You can choose from one of the listed courier companies to ship your order.
private_page_faqs_question_4: How does the return process work?
private_page_faqs_answer_4: You can request a return within 14 days of receiving the product. Simply contact customer service for assistance.
private_page_faqs_answer_5: You can pay via Cash on Delivery, Credit Card, Bank Card, or Wire Transfer/EFT.
private_page_faqs_question_6: How can I track my order?
private_page_faqs_answer_6: You can track your order through your account under the 'My Orders' section or use the tracking number provided to you.
private_page_faqs_question_7: How can I learn about discounts and promotions?
private_page_faqs_answer_7: You can subscribe to our email newsletter or follow us on social media to stay updated on the latest promotions and discounts.
private_page_faqs_answer_8: Your invoice will either be included with your package or sent to your email address electronically.
private_page_faqs_answer_9: Currently, we only ship within Turkey.
private_page_faqs_question_10: How can I cancel my order?
private_page_faqs_answer_10: You can cancel your order within 3 hours from the 'My Orders' section, or contact customer service for later cancellations.
private_page_faqs_question_11: How can I reach customer service?
private_page_faqs_answer_11: You can contact our customer service team through the 'Contact Us' page or by calling (+90 312 260 40 43).
private_page_faqs_question_12: Is there a warranty on your products?
private_page_faqs_answer_12: Yes, all of our products come with a standard 1-year warranty.
